title: Ezreal Bug
body: During the game I was playing Ezreal, but when I hovered over both Q and E abilities, the bonus damage was 0 when I had botrk, muramana, and Caulfields Warhammer, yet bonus damage remained at 0 for both abilities. Was hard to tell if it was just a visual bug or actual damage bug, because our team was so far behind when I realised. But I feel it wasn't applying bonus damage.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I saw a report of this a couple days ago, it does seem to be a visual bug only however it is persistant, afaik.

You should head over to the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board and post about it there, please be sure to read the [How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) thread before posting :).
